definitions.definition: A room containing a shower and/or bathtub , and ( typically but not necessarily ) a toilet .
A lavatory ( area where one washes or bathes ) : a room containing a toilet and ( typically but not necessarily ) a bathtub .
examples: Most Americans don't know 'WC' and many Brits mock ' bathroom' but almost everyone understands 'toilet' or 'lavatory'.
definitions.label_groups: chiefly US , South Africa , Canada , Philippines , Australia , euphemistic

main_definition: A room containing a shower and/or bathtub , and ( typically but not necessarily ) a toilet .
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly US , South Africa , Canada , Philippines , Australia , euphemistic ) A lavatory ( area where one washes or bathes ) : a room containing a toilet and ( typically but not necessarily ) a bathtub .
